mapper.select: select community.community_id as id, community_name as name, menber_count as count, location, cast (case when join_community.user_id is null then 0 else 1 end as int) as hasJoined from community left join join_community on community.community_id = join_community.community_id and join_community.user_id = #{user_id} where community_name like '%' + #{keywords} + '%'
mapper.delete: delete from join_community where user_id = #{user_id} and community_id = #{community_id}
